description.en:
Course topics include:
Topic 1: Introduction to hydrobiology
Topic 2: Plankton
Topic 3: Benthos
Topic 4: Ecology of deep-water areas
Topic 5: Ecology of coastal ecosystems
Topic 6: Reefs
Topic 7: Streams and rivers: one-way water flow systems
Topic 8: Lakes and oceans as functional wholes
Topic 9: Aquatic ecosystems and global ecology
Topic 10: Impacts of human activities on aquatic ecosystems
Topic 11: History of lakes (Paleolimnology)

objectives.en: Students will learn the basic knowledge and concepts of hydrobiology. During the course, they will acquire an overview of different aquatic ecosystems, groups of hydrobionts, and the environmental factors that affect them. Students will come to an understanding of the structure and functioning of aquatic ecosystems. They will become aware of the interrelationships between aquatic ecosystems, global climate phenomena and human activities.
objectives.et: Üliõpilased saavad selgeks hüdrobioloogia põhialused ja -mõisted. Nad omandavad ülevaate erinevatest veeökosüsteemidest, hüdrobiontide rühmadest ning neid mõjutavatest keskkonnateguritest. Tudengid jõuavad arusaamisele veeökosüsteemide struktuurist ja funktsioneerimisest. Nad teadvustavad vastastikused seosed veeökosüsteemide, globaalsete kliimanähtuste ning inimtegevuse vahel.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course, the students will:
* Know the basic concepts of hydrobiology and the basic principles of the operation of hydrobiological processes and connections.
learning_outcomes.et: * Valdavad hüdrobioloogia põhimõisteid ja hüdrobioloogiliste protsesside ning seoste toimimise põhiprintsiipe.

learning_outcomes.en: * Know the main groups of hydrobionts and can point out the adaptations of hydrobionts to aquatic biotopes and their relationships with environmental factors.
learning_outcomes.et: * Tunnevad peamisi hüdrobiontide rühmi ja oskavad välja tuua hüdrobiontide kohastumusi eluks vee-biotoopides ning nende suhteid keskkonnateguritega.

learning_outcomes.en: * Be able to give examples of relationships between hydrobionts, food chains and understand the mechanisms that control them.
learning_outcomes.et: * Oskavad tuua näiteid hüdrobiontide vahelistest suhetest, toiduahelatest ja mõistavad neid kontrollivaid mehhanisme.

learning_outcomes.en: * Have an overview of different aquatic ecosystems, their structure, and the factors that shape it.
learning_outcomes.et: * Omavad ülevaadet erinevatest veeökosüsteemidest, nende struktuurist ja seda kujundavatest teguritest.

learning_outcomes.en: * Be able to find and explain the connections between aquatic ecosystems, human activities and global climate phenomena.
learning_outcomes.et: * Oskavad leida ja selgitada seoseid veeökosüsteemide, inimtegevuse ning globaalsete kliimanähtuste vahel.

learning_outcomes.en: * Be able to understand specific hydrobiological problems in a wider socio-economic or global ecological context, as well.
learning_outcomes.et: * On võimelised nägema konkreetseid hüdrobioloogilisi probleeme ka laiemas sotsiaal-majanduslikus või globaal-ökoloogilises kontekstis.

learning_outcomes.en: * Be able to independently find the necessary information, critically analyse it and relate it to previously acquired knowledge.
learning_outcomes.et: * Oskavad iseseisvalt leida vajalikku informatsiooni, seda kriitiliselt analüüsida ning seostada eelnevalt omandatud teadmistega.
